response.original_title: Inspired by Transliteration - Chapter Four: Cracks
response.overview: Message 1: Two years ago today, 5:45 p.m. The three people wanted to draw a circle around the house with a black wire length of 150 meters. In the process of implementing the plan, a with aphobia a high aptom has the idea of jumping from this building to the opposite building. Alphobia activates obsessive-compulsive disorder. A's hyperactivity wants to jump, but a's body feels afraid and undirected. Impulsive and hesitation turned into this black wire, tying A to the place...
response.title: Inspired by Transliteration - Chapter Four: Cracks
